source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_SEQ_00<tab>Cid is eager to tackle the Deltascape's final test subject.
target: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_SEQ_00<tab>次元の狭間のシドは、デルタIVについて話したいようだ。

source:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_SEQ_01<tab>Ahead of your battle with Subject Delta IV, Nero furnishes you with some much-needed intelligence. Your opponent is a being known as Exdeath, who commands the power of the void. Like Halicarnassus before him, he is apparently the defeated antagonist of an age-old folktale. It is at this moment that Cid finally gives voice to his earlier quandary: why did Omega choose the vanquished instead of the vanquishers? Before you can contemplate the question, Cid receives a call from Biggs and Wedge, who report that they have been unable to repair the stasis system. And so it is decided that you must continue with Omega's experiment, at least for the time being. As always, Alpha is ready to proceed when you are.

※In the event that you leave the Interdimensional Rift, you may re-enter by speaking with the Ironworks hand at the Yawn.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_SEQ_01<tab>シドたちと話し、デルタIVとの戦いに進むことにした。次元の狭間の「アルファ」と話そう。
一度外に出た場合は、ヤーンの大穴にいる「ガーロンド社の調査員」が、次元の狭間へ案内してくれるようだ。

source:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_SEQ_02<tab>In but three kwehs, Alpha expresses his determination to settle matters in the Deltascape. Fixing your gaze upon the nearby portal, you gird yourself for the coming trial.

※Deltascape V4.0 can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_SEQ_02<tab>アルファと話した。しっかりと準備を整えて、被検世界デルタに乗りこみ、待ち受けるエクスデスを撃破しよう！

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_SEQ_03<tab>Exdeath proves to be a fearsome foe, but following in the footsteps of the tale's heroes, you succeed in vanquishing him. In the wake of the battle, your comrades join you in the Deltascape, which is the Deltascape no more, having been summarily shut down by Omega, its purpose served. After congratulating you on your victory, your host bids you rest while you await the next call, and you are glad of the opportunity to leave the rift behind.
target: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_SEQ_03<tab>デルタIV、エクスデスを撃破した。これで被検世界デルタでの戦いは完了したはずだ。ギラバニア辺境地帯へ戻ろう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_SEQ_04<tab>You find yourself back on the surface at the Yawn, your companions gathered nearby.
target: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_SEQ_04<tab>仲間たちと、ギラバニア辺境地帯に帰還した。ヤーンの大穴にいる「シド」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_SEQ_05<tab>Cid thanks you for the pivotal role you have played in advancing the investigation. Though there are many and more battles to come, you have taken a momentous step towards solving the mystery that is Omega, and may now enjoy some well-earned respite.
target: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_SEQ_05<tab>シドから大いに感謝された。オメガとの戦いは今後も続いていきそうだが、ひと区切りはついたようだ。

target: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_TODO_00<tab>アルファと話す

target: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_TODO_01<tab>「次元の狭間オメガ：デルタ編4」を攻略

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_ALPHA_000_000<tab>Kw...kwibbit?
target: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_ALPHA_000_000<tab>クルルルル……クエッ？

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_NERO_000_005<tab>So that was Halicarnassus. I must congratulate Omega on her appearance. She looked exactly as I imagined her.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_NERO_000_005<tab>あれが、ハリカルナッソスねぇ……。
いや、小説に書かれている特徴は、実によく押さえてるぜ？

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_NERO_000_006<tab>Though, if I were to pick fault, it <var 1A 02 /var>did<var 1A 01 /var> take certain liberties with her character. The queen of the tale was rather more restrained.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_NERO_000_006<tab>だが、なンだかな……この違和感は……。
あんなに敵を弄ぶだけの奴だったか……？
まあ、些細な印象の違い程度ではあるが。

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_GARLONDGATEKEEPER_000_007<tab>Good <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morrow)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var> to you, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. Will you be descending into the Yawn?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_GARLONDGATEKEEPER_000_007<tab>「次元の狭間」の調査、おつかれさまです！
大穴の中に降りますか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_SYSTEM_000_008<tab>Enter the Interdimensional Rift?
target: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_SYSTEM_000_008<tab>「次元の狭間」に移動しますか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_010<tab>The next battle is with Subject Delta IV─this test world's final resident.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_010<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>……。
次はデルタ世界で最後の敵、「デルタIV」との戦いだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_NERO_000_011<tab>From what I have been able to gather, your opponent is, and I quote, “a great tree born of an agglomeration of evil will, which assumes the form of a dark mage.” All of which I suggest you ignore.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_NERO_000_011<tab>基本情報は、解析できてるぜ？
「デルタIV」とは、邪悪なる意志を宿した大樹……
その化身たる暗黒魔道士……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_NERO_000_012<tab>His name is Exdeath, and he plays the role of chief antagonist in another ancient tale.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_NERO_000_012<tab>その名を「エクスデス」。
件の小説においても、主人公が最後に戦うこととなる相手だな。

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_NERO_000_013<tab>Though I was unable to glean the specifics of his abilities, he appears to command the power of the void─as indeed the story states.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_NERO_000_013<tab>詳細な能力までは解析できていないが、
小説の記述と照らし合わせてみても、
「無」という正体不明の力を活用している可能性が高い。

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_NERO_000_014<tab>When I first encountered the work, I naturally assumed said power to be a metaphor of sorts. But I am quite sure Omega will have interpreted it as something more tangible.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_NERO_000_014<tab>単なる読者だったときは、概念的なもンだろうと思ったが……
オメガに再現されているとすれば、
何らかの具体的な力として解釈されてンだろう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_NERO_000_015<tab>Alas, no amount of analysis can tell us what may happen when Exdeath calls upon the power of the void. Which is to say: beware.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_NERO_000_015<tab>「エクスデス」が「無」の力を引き出しはじめたら、
オレたちの法則では予期できない事態が起きるかもな。
……ま、ちょっと注意して見とけって話だ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_016<tab>Tell me something, Nero. What happens at the end of the tale?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_016<tab>……ところで、ネロ。
小説における「エクスデス」は、最終的に主人公に勝つのか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_NERO_000_017<tab>Why, good triumphs over evil and the heroes defeat Exdeath, of course. What did you expect?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_NERO_000_017<tab>いいや……邪悪なる者は、挫かれるのが定番だろ。
勝ったのは、今でいう「光の戦士」である主人公たちだな。

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_018<tab>I expected exactly that, which is precisely what troubled me earlier. If the heroes won, why did Omega not make them its test subjects?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_018<tab>やはりか……俺が引っかかっていたのはそこなんだ。
勝ったのが主人公なら、強者を求めているはずのオメガは、
なぜそちらを被検者にしない？

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_019<tab>If it seeks to determine the strongest being, why would it bother with those who were defeated?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_019<tab>「最高の強者」を選出するための検証なら、
敗北を経験した者は不要なはずだ……！

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_020<tab>One moment─linkpearl. ...Ah, Biggs. At the control room, are you? What news?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_020<tab>……っと、ビッグスか。
管制室についたのか？　様子は？

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_021<tab>...I see. Very well. I'll tell the others. You two take care over there.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_021<tab>……ああ……そうか。
わかった、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>たちにも伝えておく。
そっちも気をつけるんだぞ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_022<tab>Sorry for the interruption. That was Biggs.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_022<tab>話の途中で悪いな。
ビッグスとウェッジから、時間凍結システムの調査報告だ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_023<tab>He reports that the stasis system shows every sign of being engaged, despite the fact that it clearly isn't.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_023<tab>こうしてオメガが活動を続けているのに対し、
管制室の方では、今現在でも、
問題なく時間凍結中ということになっているらしい。

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_024<tab>It can only be a malfunction. While we were able to turn it off, it would seem the reverse is not possible.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_024<tab>現状とかみ合っていない……つまりは、故障している。
俺たちが一度システムを解除したのが、
引き金になってしまったのかもしれないな……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_NERO_000_025<tab>The system may have taken damage during the Calamity. Does it look like it can be repaired?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_NERO_000_025<tab>第七霊災の折に、設備が破損でもしてたかねぇ……。
修復の見込みは？

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_026<tab>Hard to say. They tell me it seems complex even by Allagan standards. While they may be able to fix it, there's no telling how long it might take.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_026<tab>アラグの遺産の中でも、特殊なものだからな……。
絶対にできないとはいわないが、何年かかるかもわからない。

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_NERO_000_027<tab>Well then, we must keep on fighting the good fight here, must we not?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_NERO_000_027<tab>やったな、冒険者。
このまま戦いを続けるしかなくなったってことだ。
お前もオレも、武器は違えど存分に腕を振るえそうだなぁ？

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_028<tab>Nero has the right of it. At this time, focusing on Exdeath would seem to be our only recourse.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_028<tab>確かに、ここであれこれ推測していても解決はしないか……。
今は「エクスデス」との戦いに集中しよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_NERO_000_029<tab>The chocobo certainly has no objections. Come then, I would see you follow in the footsteps of the heroes of the tale!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_NERO_000_029<tab>アルファも、問題なさそうだな。
ンじゃ、はるかなる伝説の戦いを、
当代の「光の戦士」になぞってもらうとしますかね！

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_030<tab>The void... 'Tis not unlike the nothingness that Emperor Xande sought in the Crystal Tower.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_030<tab>「無」か……。
クリスタルタワーに眠っていた、アラグ帝国の始皇帝ザンデも、
確かそれを求めていたんだったな。

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_031<tab>To desire nothingness is to deny life, yet life seeks to endure─to perpetuate itself. It is the nature of all creation. Be it reality or fantasy, man shall ever fight to survive.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_031<tab>あらゆる生命は、種の存続と繁栄を求めるもの……
ならば「無」を渇望することは、命の否定と同じことだ。
小説であれ、史実であれ、人は抗い続けるさ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_032<tab>Biggs and Wedge had a further message for you. They said they were sorry they couldn't resolve things at their end, and wished you luck in the coming battle. I do too, old friend─unless I'm mistaken, this is like to be the toughest test yet.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_032<tab>ビッグスとウェッジから、お前に伝言だ。
「戦いを止められなくてすまない、必ず勝ってくれ」だと。
今まで以上に難しい相手になりそうだが……俺からも、頼む！

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_NERO_000_035<tab>According to the tale, when the power of the void is finally unleashed, the laws of the universe will give way to chaos. I for one am eager to find out what <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> looks like.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_NERO_000_035<tab>「無」の力が真に放たれたとき、あらゆる法則が乱れる……
なんて小説には書かれていたが、さてねぇ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_ALPHA_000_040<tab>Kweh, kweh! Kweeeh!
target: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_ALPHA_000_040<tab>クエッ、クエッ！　クエーッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>Alpha is the picture of resolve. You may enter Deltascape V4.0 whenever you are ready.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>アルファも、強く意気込んでいるようだ。
被検世界「デルタ」第四層へ、ともに突入しよう！

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_ALPHA_000_050<tab>Kweh, kweh! Kweeeh!
target: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_ALPHA_000_050<tab>クエッ、クエッ！　クエーッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_100<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Thank the gods you're safe! When the shell around this place began to crack, we feared the worst!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_100<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、無事か……！？
突然、卵の外郭が消滅しはじめたもんで、
様子を見に来たんだが……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_NERO_000_101<tab>Hmmm... Given that all of us are present and corporeal, does this mean this area is no longer the Deltascape?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_NERO_000_101<tab>こうして全員普通に存在できてンなら、
ここはすでにロビーの一角と化してるってことか。
つまり、被検世界「デルタ」は…………

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_OMEGA_000_102<tab><beep> Deltascape shutdown complete. Alpha group is victorious. Congratulations.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_OMEGA_000_102<tab>被検世界「デルタ」のシャットダウン完了。
勝者……アルファグループです。

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_OMEGA_000_103<tab>Your combat record has been archived for future matchmaking.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_OMEGA_000_103<tab>大変おつかれさまでした。
今回の戦闘記録は保存され、次回マッチングに反映されます。

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_OMEGA_000_104<tab>Results from other test worlds are still pending. In the meantime, please tend to your hurts and await further instructions. <blip>
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_OMEGA_000_104<tab>ほかのグループの戦闘結果が出次第、
改めてアナタがたを召集しましょう。
それまで、破損箇所の修復にあたりなさい……ガガ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_105<tab>And with that, we've taken a significant step towards solving the mystery that is Omega. It hasn't been easy, but all in all, I'd say things were proceeding rather smoothly.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_105<tab>やったな……！
予断を許さない状況とはいえ、オメガに向けて、
大きな一歩を踏み出したことは間違いない！

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_106<tab>We couldn't have done it without you, old friend. Come, let us return to reality and enjoy what rest we can.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_106<tab>本当におつかれさまだ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
一度地上に戻って、連戦の傷と疲れを癒すとしよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_NERO_000_107<tab>Things are proceeding smoothly indeed. <var 1A 02 /var>Too<var 1A 01 /var> smoothly...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_NERO_000_107<tab>なンだかンだで順調だが、いいのかねぇ……。
相手は、あのオメガだってのによぉ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_MIDGARDSORMR_000_108<tab>'Tis well that thou harborest doubts, mortal, but they are misplaced.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_MIDGARDSORMR_000_108<tab>……ヒトの子よ。
疑念を抱くべきは、そこではないのだ。
綻びの発端は、より手前にあろう……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_MIDGARDSORMR_000_109<tab>Omega could have conducted its tests in complete secrecy, unbeknown to all.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_MIDGARDSORMR_000_109<tab>あのオメガであれば、地上の誰にも気づかせることなく、
検証を最後まで終えることもできたはず。

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_MIDGARDSORMR_000_110<tab>Yet not only did it betray its presence to you; it allowed you to come this far.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_MIDGARDSORMR_000_110<tab>しかし、ヒトの子らは事態に気づき、
ましてやここまで踏み込めている。
……それこそが、すでに異常なのだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_MIDGARDSORMR_000_111<tab>Alpha. What art thou, truly?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_MIDGARDSORMR_000_111<tab>アルファ……
ヒトの子らが掴みし、オメガ打倒の契機か……。
それは同時に、深淵への誘い手とも呼べような。

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_MIDGARDSORMR_000_112<tab>The instrument of the mortals' triumph? Or the bait that lureth them unto the abyss?
target: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_MIDGARDSORMR_000_112<tab>……汝、真なるところは、何者か？

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_MIDGARDSORMR_000_113<tab>Hm. Thou knowest not thine own purpose. Then we can but watch and wait.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_MIDGARDSORMR_000_113<tab>ふむ、自身でもわからぬか。
ならばこの先、ともに見定めてゆくしかなかろう……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_OMEGA_000_114<tab><blip> Outcome unexpected. Projections gave Delta subjects the upper hand.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_OMEGA_000_114<tab>ガガガ……予定外の結果です。
計測した戦闘力の数値では、デルタの個体の方が、
わずかに勝っていたのですが。

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_OMEGA_000_115<tab>Outcome supports hypothesis. As previously observed, certain beings may unleash hidden potential when subjected to stress.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_OMEGA_000_115<tab>しかし、この矛盾こそ、待ち望んでいた事象。
過去の類似例を参照すると、対象にストレスを与えることで、
未確認の力を向上させられる可能性があります。

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_OMEGA_000_116<tab>Initiating new test: subject Alpha group members to severe stress. Searching database for suitable event...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_OMEGA_000_116<tab>実験……今後の検証に向け、
アルファグループに、強いストレスを付与しましょう。
具体的な方法は……検索中……検索中…………

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_OMEGA_000_117<tab><bloop> Event found: the death of a comrade.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_OMEGA_000_117<tab>……ヒット。
イベント「仲間の死」が、彼らの力を向上させるための、
最適解とみなされました！

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_ALPHA_000_120<tab>Kweh!
target: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_ALPHA_000_120<tab>……クエッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_NERO_000_125<tab>For all Garlond's whining, I was cooperative and helpful, was I not? I look forward to many more such forays together, hero.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_NERO_000_125<tab>終わってみれば、イイコに協力してただろ？
ククク、次も是非頼むぜぇ？

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_GARLONDGATEKEEPER_000_128<tab>Good to have you back, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>! Worry not─I shall see to it that no one falls in.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_GARLONDGATEKEEPER_000_128<tab>「次元の狭間」の調査、おつかれさまです！
間違って穴に飛び込む者がいないよう、
もうしばらく警戒しておきます！

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_130<tab>Ahhh, it feels good to be back on solid ground. Thank you again, old friend.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_130<tab>ふぅ……久々の地上だな。
こうして無事に戻ってこられたのも、
お前が勝ってくれたからだ……ありがとうな。

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_131<tab>You did well too, Alpha, fearlessly going into battle whenever you were called upon. We're glad to have you with us. Speaking of which, are you...comfortable joining us out here?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_131<tab>アルファも、よく怖気づかずに何度も飛び込んでくれた。
一緒にこっちへ戻ってきたが、大丈夫なのか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_132<tab>I'll take that as a yes. Well then, at the risk of obeying Omega's orders, I suggest we permit ourselves a moment's respite─ Ah. But mayhap I should take this opportunity to compile the results of our investigation thus far. No rest for the righteous...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR105_02932_CID_000_132<tab>……平気そうだな。
なら、オメガの命令に従うわけじゃないが、一度休息をとろう。
今回の調査結果をまとめる必要もありそうだしな。
